Class MediaService

java.lang.Object
backend.service.MediaService
public class MediaService extends Object
Service class for managing Books and CDs, including borrowing, returning, fines, and administrative actions.
Version:
2.0 // updated after adding CD management and fine calculations
Author:
Hiba_ibraheem
